Documentation Updates

Below are recent documentation updates.

Index of all documentation updates

If you would like be sent an email whenever this page changes, please see the Setup Automatic Email on Documentation Updates document.

17-February-2023

New Docs

  • Title: Adding an Application ID to the Player Embed Code
  • Description: This docs existed on the Studio site, but added it to the Brightcove Player site also, as that was a logical place for many people to look for it.
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/publish/adding-application-id-player-embed-code.html
  • Product: Brightcove Player
  • Product Area: Publishing Players
  • Title: Submitting Apps to the LG (webOS) Store
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn how to submit your device app to the LG store.
  • Link: https://beacon-help.support.brightcove.com/publishing-apps/lg/submitting-to-lg.html
  • Product: Beacon
  • Product Area: LG Apps

Major updates

  • Title: FAQ: Analytics Module
  • Description: Updated information on data refresh time for Analytics to reflect EOL of "real-time" analytics.
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/analytics/module/faq-analytics-module.html
  • Product: Video Cloud
  • Product Area: Analytics
  • Title: Submitting Apps to the LG (webOS) Store
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn how to submit your device app to the LG store.
  • Link: https://beacon-help.support.brightcove.com/publishing-apps/lg/submitting-to-lg.html
  • Product: Beacon
  • Product Area: LG Apps
